coreAttributes.name: pristine arcane feather
coreAttributes.description: This feather is said to have been plucked from a Lilin's wings. Its arcane nature allows it to be absorbed into someone's aura to grant them the ability to cast a ranged attack. This particular feather is in pristine condition, granting immense power.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Use your feather's power to shoot a bolt of energy at [npc2.name].
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(focus)] on the energy in the arcane feather. As [npc.she] [npc.does] so, it dissolves and flows into [npc.her] aura, granting [npc.herHim] the ability to perform arcane-imbued attacks at range.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(focus)] on extracting the absorbed arcane energy inside of [npc.her] aura. As [npc.she] [npc.does] so, it reforms back into an arcane feather.

hitDescriptions.hitText: #IF(npc.isFeral()) Harnessing the power of the arcane feather, [npc.name] materialises a bolt of arcane energy around [npc.her] body, before shooting it out to strike [npc2.name]! #ELSE Thrusting [npc.her] [npc.arm] out in front of [npc.herHim], a bolt of arcane energy materialises around [npc.namePos] [npc.arm], before shooting out to strike [npc2.name]! #ENDIF

#IF(npc.isFeral()) Making a quick forwards movement, [npc.name] shoots a bolt of arcane energy to strike [npc2.name]! #ELSE Making a quick forwards thrust with [npc.her] [npc.arm], a bolt of arcane energy shoots out of [npc.namePos] [npc.hand] to strike [npc2.name]! #ENDIF

#IF(npc.isFeral()) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(make)] an aggressive movement towards [npc2.name], causing a bolt of arcane energy to fly out and hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest! #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] [npc.her] [npc.arm] at [npc2.name], causing a bolt of arcane energy to fly out and hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest! #ENDIF

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting [npc.her] [npc.arm] out in front of [npc.herHim], a bolt of arcane energy materialises around [npc.namePos] [npc.arm], before shooting out and narrowly missing [npc2.name]!
Making a quick forwards thrust with [npc.her] [npc.arm], a bolt of arcane energy shoots out of [npc.namePos] [npc.hand] to narrowly miss [npc2.name]!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] [npc.her] [npc.arm] at [npc2.name], causing a bolt of arcane energy to fly out and narrowly miss [npc2.herHim]!
